segments.text: I see the domestic bliss turning chaotic here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's neutral expression while drying that plate is almost comical.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet the overflowing sink is creating a watery disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle expanding, cabinets getting soakedâ€”it's depressing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool, hand in the cookie jar, looks so determined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But his balance is off; that stool's about to give.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaching up seems innocent enough in her anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their cookie heist is the highlight of mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden through the window is picture-perfect.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Tidy paths and plants, no sign of turmoil.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It surprises me how contained the mess is to indoors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry about slips and falls in that wet spot.
segments.speaker: PAR
